Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute near 130th/King Drive
ShortDescription: 34 S Mchgn buses rtd SB via 130th, Indiana, 134th, 133rd Pl, Langley, 131st & Ellis; NB via Ellis, 133rd, 133rd Pl, Langley, 131st, Vernon, 134th, Indiana & 130

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 130th/King Drive.

  • Southbound buses will operate via 130th, Indiana, 134th, 133rd Pl, Langley, 131st & Ellis.
  • Northbound buses will operate via  Ellis, 133rd, 133rd Pl, Langley, 131st, Vernon, 134th, Indiana & 130th.

Allow extra travel time.
